Package ru.nsu.kolodina.snake

package ru.nsu.kolodina.snake
  • Class
    Description
    baseController
    Base controller class for Snake game.
    Controller
    Controller class for handling Snake game input and movement.
    ControllerEvilSnake
    Controller for the evil snake that chases the player.
    ControllerParasiteSnake
    Controller for the parasite snake that targets fruits.
    ControllerStupidSnake
    Controller for the stupid snake that moves randomly.
    Coordinates
    Represents coordinates (x, y) on the game field.
    Field
    Represents the game field consisting of pixels.
    Fruits
    Manages fruits on the game field, including spawning and tracking eaten fruits.
    FXML_ctrl
    Controller class for handling the FXML layout of the Snake game.
    Level
    Class representing a level in the Snake game.
    MainApp
    The main class of the Snake game application.
    Map
    Represents the game map, which includes the dimensions and wall placements.
    Pixel
    Represents a single pixel in the game field.
    Pixel.pixelType
    Enum representing the possible types of a pixel.
    Snake
    Represents a snake in the game.
    TickTimer
    A custom timer that controls the movement of the snakes in the game.
